display.title: Best LV Circuits
description: &&6The best LV Circuits&&r! You can start to churn these guys out, as you'll be making them for the rest of the game.
Try to keep a stockpile of these crafted at all times - making these on-demand can take a while.
Reaching &&5EV&&r will unlock methods to make them even cheaper.

subtitle.text: It Feels Good to be the Best
